tool_description: OCR Lite is an API (Application Programming Interface) that provides a simplified and lightweight solution for Optical Character Recognition (OCR) tasks. OCR is a technology that enables computers to extract text from images or scanned documents. OCR Lite focuses on offering essential OCR functionalities with reduced complexity and resource requirements.  The API allows developers to integrate OCR capabilities into their applications or systems, making it easier to automate text extraction pr...
name: OCR Lite
title: OCR Lite

api_list.name: Get Data
api_list.description: GetOCRData is a function or tool that provides accurate data extraction from images using Optical Character Recognition (OCR) technology. OCR is a technology that enables the conversion of scanned images or photographs of text into editable and searchable data.
